banner.name: Wiktor
banner.subtitle: building modern web apps with Vue/React and .NET.

about.title: About me
about.text: I’m a Fullstack Developer with over 3 years of experience building modern web applications using React, Vue, and .NET. I focus on creating clean, scalable, and high-performance solutions. I enjoy combining frontend precision with backend logic while maintaining code quality and effective teamwork.

listItems.details: Designing and developing web applications and APIs using .NET and Vue. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to build scalable B2B solutions.
Maintaining cloud infrastructure, automating CI/CD pipelines, and supporting development teams in a hybrid environment.
Building and maintaining WordPress-based websites and applications. Working with CI/CD tools and managing development environments.
Developing user interfaces and responsive web pages. Collaborating with designers and backend developers to deliver projects for international clients.

listItems.name: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
listItems.description: Covers core JavaScript concepts, algorithms, and data structures, focusing on writing clean, efficient code.

listItems.name: Learn React: Introduction Course
listItems.description: Introduces React fundamentals including components, props, and state management for building interactive UIs.

listItems.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
listItems.description: Validates understanding of cloud concepts, Azure services, and the basics of DevOps in Microsoft environments.

listItems.name: Responsive Web Design
listItems.description: Focuses on building mobile-friendly layouts using HTML and CSS with modern responsive techniques.

listItems.name: Learn Vue.js Course
listItems.description: Teaches how to build reactive user interfaces with Vue.js, covering components, directives, and data binding.

listItems.name: Introduction to DevOps Course
listItems.description: Provides an overview of DevOps principles including continuous integration, automation, and collaboration.

listItems.name: Learn Bash Scripting Course
listItems.description: Covers automation of repetitive tasks through Bash scripting and core command-line techniques.

listItems.name: Learn the Command Line Course
listItems.description: Teaches essential command-line operations for navigating, managing files, and executing programs efficiently.

listItems.name: Project Management Principles
listItems.description: Introduces core project management methodologies, planning strategies, and team coordination skills.
